description: Try our easy to follow Hoisin Pork With Crispy Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork stir-fry,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Hoisin Pork With Crispy Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 carrot, halved lengthways, thinly sliced diagonally
450g bottle buttermilk pancake shaker, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat oil in a wok or large, deep frying pan over a medium-high heat. Stir-fry pork for 3-4 minutes or until just cooked through. Remove from pan.
Combine sauces, vinegar and sugar in a small bowl or jug.

Reheat wok over high heat. Add capsicum, celery and carrot and stir-fry for 3 minutes or until softened. Add beans and 2 tbs water. Stir-fry for 3 minutes or until almost tender. Add sauce mixture and pork. Stir-fry for 2 minutes or until heated through. Add onion, sprouts and cabbage. Stir-fry for 1 minute. Serve with rice.
